H0.text: Which famous employee-owned UK retailer's slogan is 'Never Knowingly Undersold'. Waitrose

H1.text: Which famous employee-owned UK retailer's slogan is 'Never Knowingly Undersold'. M&S

H2.text: Which famous employee-owned UK retailer's slogan is 'Never Knowingly Undersold'. Harrods

H3.text: Which famous employee-owned UK retailer's slogan is 'Never Knowingly Undersold'. John Lewis

A4.text: Spedan Lewis devised the slogan 'never knowingly undersold' at Peter Jones.
